title: Unexpected when Connection File is in an unmapped Network Drive
author: app/
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
When chosing connection file from prompt dialog changes to that file should be written to the same location I chose the file from.

## Current Behavior
mRemoteNG tries to load a file from e.g. Z:\. It doesn't find it and asks for another or a new config file. Chose the new lcoation of the config file. It opens but changes will be written to the old location

## Possible Solution

notes:
AI triage (claude): Application throws an unhandled exception when the configured connection file path points to an unmapped network drive because File.GetLastWriteTimeUtc(), File.Exists(), and FileSystemWatcher calls lack network-specific error handling.
Approach: Wrap file I/O calls in Runtime.cs (LoadConnections) and FileDataProvider with try/catch for IOException/UnauthorizedAccessException, show a user-friendly dialog explaining the network path is unreachable, and fall back to the default local connections file.
